page.title: 13RECREATION-OVER 60 CLUB
page.content: An 'Over 60 Club' is organised and meets in Leyburn once a week. It is held in a local cafe. The members who are all retired people pay a weekly fee of 10p which covers the cost of the refreshments which are provided. The afternoon is spent playing games such as Whist and Dominoes. Prizes are given to the winners and also those who score the least number of points. When any member has a birthday or wedding anniversary to celebrate there is usually a party given on the club afternoon nearest to the actual day. The committee organise one full-day outing each year and three or four half-day outings for the members. Visits to the theatre are also arranged at Christmas time.
